name: Civilization (itch)
description:
How To Play.
There a some wierd issues with buying a collector/village, so if you clicky, you gotta buy ;C

Controls
Left Click on tiles to open info or to open up the buy UI
Right Click on the grass tile to open up buy UI for villages

Creating a Raid
After clicking Collect you have to right click a village to select that village to send troops from
1 Troop = 20 of each
It will force you to give 3 of water and food per troop (i couldnt figure out a better way)
Troops slowly degrade over time while traveling (aka their chance of survival per tick is reduced) which gets greatly reduced if lack of food. Also, during night time, troops have higher chance of dying. But eat less
